mapper.select: select id, title, content, hit, regDate, writerId from NoteView where writerId=#{writerId} order by regDate DESC
select id, title, content, hit, regDate, writerId from NoteView where writerId=#{writerId} and title like concat('%', #{title}, '%') order by regDate DESC
mapper.insert: insert into Note(title, content, writerId, publish) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{publish})
mapper.update: update Note set hit=hit+1 where id=#{id}
